name: TV
description:
Client is 68 years old, single, has been staying with her younger sister (reported to have suboptimal IQ) in Tampines rental HDB after their father passed away and mother was sent to nursing home. They have been unemployed due to their medical conditions. They are mainly home and watching TV is their only enjoyment together. However, their TV recently spoilt. 

They also don’t have a telephone at home and often need to go to the neighbour for help to call out if emergency. Hence, we are requesting for a TV and house phone for them. As client is unable to afford the delivery cost, he will need the cost to be borne by the donor.

passiton.name: Prism+ 32-inch Android TV with Receiving Antenna
passiton.description: Bought this TV for study room and own it less than 2 years. We have a new Smart TV so do not have use for this Android TV. All working well except sometimes need to today off main power and reboot. Perfectly ok with scanning and accessing local channels.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview
passiton.dimensions: 72cm length x 46cm height x 16cm depth, including tabletop stand legs

name: Washing Machine
description: Family consists of 5 family members, one of whom has physical and mental health conditions requiring her daughter to care for her. In addition, her daughter is caring for 2 young children who are in pre-school. As such, daughter's husband is the main income earner, working with Grab Delivery. However, his income is irregular and insufficient for their basic needs, hence needing to rely on financial assistance. Daughter's husband is working towards a driving license and looking for other more regular jobs. Due to financial difficulties, the family is unable to pay for a new washing machine, which is faulty currently. The washing machine will help in getting their household chores done efficiently and alleviate daughter's caregiving stress.

passiton.name: Aprica day bed rocker
passiton.description:
Pre-loved and still in good condition. Cushion and cover have been washed and kept.
Suitable from new born to 3 years old (up to 15kg)
Can be used as a high-low bed or as a high chair as it comes with 5 point harness and removable table
5 recline positions to a full recline
Swing mechanism cradles the baby as if in mom's arms
Body support cushion
4 wheels with brakes

name: Milk
description: Family is a low income family with multiple young children, of which 2 of them are still on milk and diapers. As family is currently facing tight finances and child protection concerns (father also difficulties securing a job due to his health), it has been difficult for the family to get some stable income. Mother is the main caregiver of the young children as they are not in childcare yet. The family would require some milk  support in the mean time as FSC work with them in exploring childcare placement and managing the child protection concerns. It would be helpful if a donor can provide 4-6 tins of 1.8kg Lactogen 3. Please feel free to email me for more information, thank you!

passiton.name: Baby milk bottle warmer
passiton.description: Milk bottle warmer still in very good condition
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview
